name: MicroBook
short_description:
This is a simple page which lets one post text, and optionally pictures.  Posts are listed last-post-first on the page.  Probably the best use of this is as a social/collaboration tool for a group (like our IRC chat group) or a company.

Support can be found on our IRC channel at server www.alton-moore.net, channel #vcats

To install, copy this to the desired directory on your web server, create the subdirectory referred to in the program ("microbook" in this case), then set the ownership of that directory to the web server's user, which is "www-data" under debian for example, with the command:  chown www-data microbook  The program will create its data file automatically.
summary: Facebook-like page for group or company use
